summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Kenyon Place, from Fauntleroy Avenue to a point 500 feet east thereof, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9129 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
